description.@en: Feel the earth tremble beneath your feet!

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and foes in an Explosion Template cannot or fail to Resist using Athletics), they suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] Damage. Roll Chaos Dice as you normally would for Injuries, but if any land on face ‘6,’ they are Slain! instead.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but add [[/roll 3D6]] Chaos Dice to determine if foes are Slain!

criticalFailure.@en: The earth suddenly opens up below your feet, and unless you successfully Resist using Athletics, you are Slain!.

reagents.@en: Two obsidian rings, worn on the fingers and pointed downwards

system.distance: Explosion Template, extending from any place you can clearly see
